movies.title: Fight Club
movies.plot: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

movies.title: Star Trek
movies.plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful, time-traveling Romulan creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

movies.title: Army of Darkness
movies.plot: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

movies.title: Requiem for a Dream
movies.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions become stronger.

movies.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
movies.plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but doesn't quite understand the concept.

movies.title: Edward Scissorhands
movies.plot: An uncommonly gentle young man, who happens to have scissors for hands, falls in love with a beautiful girl.

movies.title: Donnie Darko
movies.plot: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.plot: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Gone Girl
movies.plot: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

movies.title: Big Hero 6
movies.plot: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

movies.title: Edge of Tomorrow
movies.plot: A military officer is brought into an alien war against an extraterrestrial enemy who can reset the day and know the future. When this officer is enabled with the same power, he teams up with a Special Forces warrior to try and end the war.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.plot: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.plot: A young man is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.
